channel.title: CVE Feed for Go -- SSH library
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go -- SSH library

item.title: CVE-2017-3204|2024-08-05T14:16:28.305Z -- go -- ssh%20library
item.description: The Go SSH library (x/crypto/ssh) by default does not verify host keys, facilitating man-in-the-middle attacks. Default behavior changed in commit e4e2799 to require explicitly registering a hostkey verification mechanism.
